commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Now all that's left is to let it simmer for a bit.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Quite right. What shall we do while we wait for the hotpot to finish cooking? We have already finished washing up, so...

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Why don't we take a break, then? I actually bought a cheesecake to snack on.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: What? A ch-cheesecake?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I put it in the fridge when I got here, so I'll bring it out right now!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A cheesecake. I'm so happy. Rina-chan Board says, "Woo-hoo!"

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh! Hang on, Kotori!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Hm? What's wrong, Eli? You look like you've seen a ghost.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Stop me if I'm wrong... Don't tell me you're gonna put that cheesecake into the hotpot... You're not, right?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: What?! Of course I'm not!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: R-Really? Sorry, I didn't think you were the type of person who would do that, but I just got a little worried.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You must still be reeling from the shock of the beets.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: I'm sorry for surprising you, Eli.

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Oh, that's not it! Don't worry about it. I'm sorry to both of you, Emma and Kotori.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: It's okay! I mean, a cheesecake's not gonna taste good in a hotpot, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: You wanna give it a shot?

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: I believe it would be wise not to! Let us just consume this cheesecake in a normal manner!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Okay! I'll go steep us some tea.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Then I will get us the plates and forks.

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Hmm...

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yoshiko? Why are you in deep thought in front of the hotpot? Are you not going to help set the table?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: Ack!? Wh-What?!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Excuse me? I should be asking you that question. What is the matter with you?

commands.speaker: Yoshiko
commands.line: N-Nothing! Uhh, you want me to help set the table, right?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oooh, it looks so good! Rina-chan Board says, "Eager!"

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Shall we dig in?

commands.speaker: Dia, Yoshiko, Kotori, Emma, Rina
commands.line: Thanks for the food!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Mmm, it's so good!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, it's really tasty! This cheesecake is amazing, Kotori!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Mmm! It is absolutely divine!

commands.speaker: Eli
commands.line: Uh-huh. Nothing beats eating cheesecake the normal way.
